edu.northwestern.at.utils.logger
Class StandardErrorLogger

java.lang.Object
  edu.northwestern.at.utils.logger.StandardErrorLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger
public class StandardErrorLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements Logger

Simple logger which outputs log messages to standard error.
